name: Glaive Memory Boost!
effect: [Main] Return 1 purple Digimon card from your trash to your hand. Then, place this card in your battle area.[Main] ＜Delay＞ (Trash this card in your battle area to activate the effect below. You can't activate this effect the turn this card enters play.)・Gain 2 memory.
security_effect: [Security] Place this card in its owner's battle area.
